metadata.title: CVE-2020-26976 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When a HTTPS pages was embedded in a HTTP page, and there was a serviceworker registered for the former, the service worker could have interceptedthe request for the secure page despite the iframe not being a securecontext due to the (insecure) framing. This vulnerability affects Firefox <84.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
